            "FlowRatio": 50,
            "UrlParam": {
                "Key": "key",
                "Value": "value"
            },
            "Priority": 0,
            "IsDefaultPriority": true
        }
    ],
    "TrafficType": "",
    "OperatorRemark": "remark",
    "GrayFlowRatio": 0
}
